Text: Great torrent! Was looking a long time for something like this "all in one" torrent... Thanks uploader!:)))
Official url is in README.txt file. In there you can post feedback right to the maker of this repack... :)

Much compliments for your work Ramiax!!!!
This works great. (on my win7 64Bit)

Even parts of the game I never saw.

Thanks!!!!!!!!
Anyone else getting a corrupt ISO when downloading this?
For those with the corrupt ISO issues: download WinISO/IsoBuster, open the .ISO file, extract all .bin files, setup.exe and the redist folder somewhere, then run Setup.exe. Works fine this way.
Or not. It DOES extract the files OK, but the installer pops up IsDone.dll error: Not Enough RAM (/w 2GB specs. Seriously, what the hell?)
It seems that there is a problem with HP PCs windows XP becouse it shows corrupt iso when you try to mount it. Looking forward to fixing this when i have spare time...
im kind of  sad  that  this  dosent  work cause i was  looking forward   to replay hl2 :(  i also get  isdone.dll error i hope ramiax can re-release this torrent without  problems

Here is the new torrent, where everything is fixed! :)
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7496663/Half-Life_Singleplayer_Edition_2012_(Godmode)_-_v1.30

Works great on win7 x64. This is a great torrent. For all the people getting errors when mounting the ISO, just extract it using 7zip and install directly. You can also burn this to 3 DVD5 with no problems, the installer will prompt you to insert the next disc when required.
